name: webtrees
description: webtrees is a self-hosted genealogy application that lets users build and explore family trees online. It supports GEDCOM imports, collaboration, and detailed person records via a web interface.

features.title: Family Tree Building
features.description: Create comprehensive family trees with individuals, relationships, and multiple generations

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Import and export family data using the standard GEDCOM format for compatibility with other tools

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Attach photos, documents, and videos to individuals and events for rich family histories

features.title: Collaborative Editing
features.description: Allow multiple family members to contribute and edit the family tree simultaneously

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set visibility levels for living individuals to protect privacy while sharing historical data

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Track sources, citations, and research notes to document the evidence for family connections
